sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import web3 from '../libs/web3'; import getProjectContract from '../libs/project'; class Project extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); // 获取 路由参数address this.state = { project:{} } } async componentWillMount(){ console.log(this.props) // 获取地址 const address = this.props.match.params.address // 获取合约实例 let instance = getProjectContract(address); console.log(instance); let [ owner, projectName, goal, maxInvest, minInvest, description, symbol, name, decimals, startDate, bonusEnds, bonusTokenToWei, tokenToWei, endDate ] = Object.values(await instance.methods.getDetails().call()) let project = { address, owner, projectName: await web3.utils.toUtf8(projectName), goal: await web3.utils.fromWei(goal,"ether"), maxInvest: await web3.utils.fromWei(maxInvest,"ether"), minInvest: await web3.utils.fromWei(minInvest,"ether"), description, symbol: await web3.utils.toUtf8(symbol), name: await web3.utils.toUtf8(name), decimals, startDate: new Date(startDate*1000), bonusEnds: new Date(bonusEnds*1000), bonusTokenPrice: await web3.utils.fromWei(bonusTokenToWei,"ether"), tokenPrice: await web3.utils.fromWei(tokenToWei,"ether"), endDate: new Date(endDate*1000) } this.setState({ project: project }) } render(){ return (
项目地址: {this.state.project.address}
项目名: {this.state.project.projectName} 众筹金额 {this.state.project.goal} eth
最大投资金额 {this.state.project.maxInvest} 最小投资金额 {this.state.project.minInvest}
项目币简称 {this.state.project.symbol} 项目币全称 {this.state.project.name}
token价值 {this.state.project.tokenPrice} 多少位小数 {this.state.project.decimals}
开始时间 {this.state.project.startDate} 结束时间 {this.state.project.endDate}
奖励截止时间 {this.state.project.bonusEnds} 奖励时token价值 {this.state.project.bonusTokenPrice}
); } } export default Project;
